//
// cbuffer cbViewProjection
// {
//
//   row_major float3x4 gView;          // Index:    0 1 2            Components:    12
//   row_major float4x4 gProjection;    // Index:    3 4 5 6          Components:    16 [unused]

//   float4 gITMGF;                     // Index:   15.xyzw           Components:     4 [unused]
//   float2 gfLinearZ;                  // Index:   16.xy             Components:     2 [unused]
//

//
// cbuffer c1
// {
//
//   float4 m_vSpecularParams;          // Index:    0.xyzw           Components:     4 [unused]
//   float4 m_vTrailParams;             // Index:    1.xyzw           Components:     4 [unused]
//   float4 m_vFlowMapOffset;           // Index:    2.xyzw           Components:     4 [unused]
//   float2 m_vFlowMapSize;             // Index:    3.xy             Components:     2 [unused]
//   float3 m_vColourMul;               // Index:    4.xyz            Components:     3 [unused]
//   float2 m_vNormalScale;             // Index:    5.xy             Components:     2
//   float m_fVelocityScale;            // Index:    6.x              Components:     1 [unused]
//   float m_fFogMul;                   // Index:    7.x              Components:     1 [unused]
//

// Resource Bindings:

// ------------------------------ ---------- ------- ----------- ---- --------

// -------------------- ----- ------ -------- -------- ------- ------

// Name                 Index   Mask Register SysValue  Format   Used
// -------------------- ----- ------ -------- -------- ------- ------
// SV_Position              0   xyzw        0      POS   float   xyzw
// TEXCOORD                 0   xyz         1     NONE   float   xyz
// TEXCOORD                 1   xyzw        2     NONE   float   xyzw
// TEXCOORD                 2   xyzw        3     NONE   float   xyzw
// TEXCOORD                 3   xyz         4     NONE   float   xyz
//
vs_5_0
dcl_globalFlags refactoringAllowed
dcl_constantbuffer cb4[3], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb5[11], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb1[6], immediateIndexed
dcl_input v0.xyz
dcl_input v1.xyzw
dcl_input v2.xyzw
dcl_output_siv o0.xyzw, position
dcl_output o1.xyz
dcl_output o2.xyzw
dcl_output o3.xyzw
dcl_output o4.xyz
dcl_temps 3
// 3DMigoto StereoParams:
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t125

ld_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r2.xyzw, l(0, 0, 0, 0), t125.xyzw

mov r0.xyz, v0.xyzx
mov r0.w, l(1.000000)
dp4 r1.x, cb4[0].xyzw, r0.xyzw
dp4 r1.y, cb4[1].xyzw, r0.xyzw
dp4 r1.z, cb4[2].xyzw, r0.xyzw
mov r1.w, l(1.000000)
dp4 r0.x, cb5[7].xyzw, r1.xyzw
dp4 r0.y, cb5[8].xyzw, r1.xyzw
dp4 r0.w, cb5[10].xyzw, r1.xyzw
dp4 o0.z, cb5[9].xyzw, r1.xyzw
mov o0.xyw, r0.xyxw

// Automatic vertex shader halo fix inserted with DarkStarSword's asmtool.py:
// asmtool.py --auto-fix-vertex-halo -i --only-autofixed 06a8e5bda4198913-vs.txt
ne r2.w, r0.w, l(1.0)
if_nz r2.w
  add r2.w, r0.w, -r2.y
  mad r0.x, r2.w, r2.x, r0.x
endif

mov o4.xyz, r0.xywx
mul r0.xyz, cb4[1].xyzx, cb5[0].yyyy
mad r0.xyz, cb5[0].xxxx, cb4[0].xyzx, r0.xyzx
mad r0.xyz, cb5[0].zzzz, cb4[2].xyzx, r0.xyzx
dp3 r0.x, r0.xyzx, v1.xyzx
mul r1.xyz, cb4[1].xyzx, cb5[1].yyyy
mad r1.xyz, cb5[1].xxxx, cb4[0].xyzx, r1.xyzx
mad r1.xyz, cb5[1].zzzz, cb4[2].xyzx, r1.xyzx
dp3 r0.y, r1.xyzx, v1.xyzx
mul r1.xyz, cb4[1].xyzx, cb5[2].yyyy
mad r1.xyz, cb5[2].xxxx, cb4[0].xyzx, r1.xyzx
mad r1.xyz, cb5[2].zzzz, cb4[2].xyzx, r1.xyzx
dp3 r0.z, r1.xyzx, v1.xyzx
dp3 r0.w, r0.xyzx, r0.xyzx
rsq r0.w, r0.w
mul o1.xyz, r0.wwww, r0.xyzx
dp3 r0.x, cb4[0].xyzx, v2.xyzx
dp3 r0.y, cb4[1].xyzx, v2.xyzx
dp3 r0.z, cb4[2].xyzx, v2.xyzx
dp3 r0.w, r0.xyzx, r0.xyzx
rsq r0.w, r0.w
mul r0.xyz, r0.wwww, r0.xyzx
dp3 o2.x, cb5[0].xyzx, r0.xyzx
dp3 o2.y, cb5[1].xyzx, r0.xyzx
dp3 o2.z, cb5[2].xyzx, r0.xyzx
mov o2.w, v2.w
mov r0.x, v1.w
mov r0.y, v2.w
mul o3.zw, r0.xxxy, cb1[5].xxxy
mov o3.xy, r0.xyxx
ret
// Approximately 42 instruction slots used
